name: Last Legacy (Ary Alexandre Pallas)
description:
The leyend begins 

The tyrannical Kingdom of Solheim haunts your home. Obtain the symbol of power, the demon sword of Kalik, reputation and above all the ultimatum of the legacies awaits you.

Controls

  • WASD
  • E,R
  • Mouse

Specs 

Unity game for Windows 

Credits
